categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Shadow Captain was a male Imperial Commando who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic as a member of the elite shadow commandos. In 3643 BBY, the Captain and his squad were killed by a Jedi Knight during a fight in one of Nasan Godera's laboratories on the planet Taris.
